title: The Writer's Almanac - Tuesday, November 17, 2020
description: On this date 50 years ago, Douglas Engelbart received a patent for the first computer mouse. He never received any royalties.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: On this date 50 years ago, Douglas Engelbart received a patent for the first computer mouse. He never received any royalties.
